name: Heatran
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Basic Energy cards attached to Heatran. (If you can't discard cards, this attack does nothing.

name: Lucario
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Lucario by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon

name: Luxray
AbilityText: As long as Luxray is your Active Pokemon, any damage done by an opponent's attack is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Luxray does 40 damage to itself.

name: Probopass
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Yanmega
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard an Energy attached to Yanmega.

name: Cherrim
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage and remove 3 damage counters from Cherrim.

name: Carnivine
Attack1Text: Before doing damage, count the remaining HP of the Defending Pokemon and Carnivine. If the Defending Pokemon has fewer remaining HP than Carnivine's, this attack does 60 damage instead.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Luxio
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Chimchar
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Chimchar.

name: Croagunk
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't play any Supporter cards from his or her hand during his or her next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Happiny
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Chansey from your hand onto Happiny (this counts as evolving Happiny) and remove all damage counters from Happiny.
Attack1Text: Remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokemon.

name: Piplup
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Riolu
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.
